ahem.gloss: the utterance of a sound similar to clearing the throat

synonyms.word: army high performance computing research center

ahvenanmaa.gloss: an archipelago of some 6,000 islands in the Gulf of Bothnia under Finnish control

ahead.gloss: having the leading position or higher score in a contest
leading or ahead in a competition

ahorse.gloss: on the back of a horse

ahorseback.gloss: on the back of a horse

a hundred times.gloss: by a factor of one hundred

ahead of time.gloss: before the usual time or the time expected
